articles.title: Claude 4 Released: Anthropic's Most Capable AI Yet
articles.summary: Anthropic announces Claude 4 with significantly improved reasoning, coding abilities, and a 500K context window. Early benchmarks show substantial improvements in complex problem-solving tasks.

articles.title: How We Built a $2M ARR SaaS in 6 Months Using AI Coding Assistants
articles.summary: A detailed breakdown of how a 2-person team leveraged Claude, Cursor, and automation tools to build and ship a complex B2B product at unprecedented speed. Includes specific prompts and workflows.

articles.title: LangGraph 2.0: Visual Workflow Builder for AI Agents
articles.summary: LangChain releases LangGraph 2.0 with a visual editor for building multi-agent systems. New features include native tool use, memory management, and one-click deployment to cloud platforms.

articles.title: The Complete Guide to Building AI-First Products
articles.summary: A comprehensive tutorial covering product strategy, technical architecture, and go-to-market approaches for AI-native applications. Includes frameworks used by successful AI startups.

articles.title: OpenAI Launches GPT-5 with Real-Time Learning Capabilities
articles.summary: GPT-5 introduces the ability to learn from conversation context and user corrections in real-time. Pricing starts at $30/million tokens with enterprise options available.

articles.title: AI Startup Funding Hits $50B in 2025, Enterprise Tools Lead
articles.summary: Annual report shows AI startup investment reached record levels, with B2B AI tools capturing 60% of funding. Key trends include vertical AI solutions and AI infrastructure plays.

articles.title: Practical RAG Patterns: From Simple to Production-Grade
articles.summary: An engineering deep-dive into retrieval-augmented generation architectures, comparing different chunking strategies, embedding models, and reranking approaches with real benchmarks.

articles.title: Scaling Laws for AI Agents: What Works at 1M Daily Users
articles.summary: Research paper analyzing the performance characteristics of AI agent systems at scale. Findings suggest new architectural patterns for handling concurrent agent interactions.

articles.title: Building Voice AI Assistants: A Step-by-Step Tutorial
articles.summary: Complete guide to building voice-enabled AI assistants using Whisper, Claude, and ElevenLabs. Includes code samples, latency optimization tips, and deployment strategies.

articles.title: Cursor 2.0: The IDE That Writes Code For You
articles.summary: Major update to the AI-powered IDE includes multi-file editing, automatic test generation, and seamless integration with Claude and GPT models. Free tier now includes 500 completions/day.

articles.title: How Notion Built Their AI Features: An Engineering Deep Dive
articles.summary: Notion's engineering team shares their approach to integrating AI across their product, including prompt engineering, caching strategies, and handling edge cases at scale.

articles.title: The Economics of AI: When to Build vs Buy
articles.summary: Framework for evaluating build-vs-buy decisions for AI capabilities, including cost analysis models, vendor comparison criteria, and real examples from startups.

articles.title: Google DeepMind's New Multimodal Model Understands Video
articles.summary: Gemini Ultra 2 demonstrates unprecedented video understanding capabilities, able to follow complex narratives and answer questions about hours of footage.

articles.title: Automating Customer Support with AI: Real Results from 50 Startups
articles.summary: Survey results showing how startups are using AI for customer support, with metrics on resolution rates, cost savings, and customer satisfaction scores.

articles.title: Vercel AI SDK 4.0: Streaming, Tools, and Multi-Provider Support
articles.summary: New release adds streaming responses, native tool calling, and seamless switching between AI providers. Designed for building production AI applications with Next.js.
